stack.name: jaco

description.brief: ROS stack for Kinova JACO arm

stack.description: The ROS JACO Arm stack provides a ROS interface for the Kinova Robotics JACO robotic manipulator arm. This stack provides access to the Kinova JACO C++ hardware API through ROS.
stack.author: Jeff Schmidt (Clearpath)
Alex Bencz (Clearpath)
Matt DeDonato (WPI)
